org.modelio.api.ui

Interface UIFont


  • public interface UIFont
    The UIFont values are named upon a formal set of rules. Here is the rules summary.
    The name has the form: XXX_ZZ where:
    • XXX represents the font size among SMALL, NORMAL, LARGE, XLARGE
    • ZZ is either nothing, I, G or GI for standard, Italic, bold or bold italic font.
    The font family is the system default font family. All sizes are relative to the system default font size, a multiplier is applied to compute the actual font size.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static float LARGE_SIZE 
      static float SMALL_SIZE 
      static float XLARGE_SIZE
